TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed SYSKIND extends System.Enum

remarks.para: For additional information about the SYSKIND enumeration, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions.

summary.para: Identifies the target operating system platform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.SYSKIND SYS_MAC = int32(2)

summary.para: The target operating system for the type library is Apple Macintosh. By default, all data fields are aligned on even-byte boundaries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.SYSKIND SYS_WIN16 = int32(0)

summary.para: The target operating system for the type library is 16-bit Windows systems. By default, data fields are packed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.SYSKIND SYS_WIN32 = int32(1)

summary.para: The target operating system for the type library is 32-bit Windows systems. By default, data fields are naturally aligned (for example, 2-byte integers are aligned on even-byte boundaries; 4-byte integers are aligned on quad-word boundaries, and so on).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.SYSKIND SYS_WIN64 = int32(3)

summary.para: The target operating system for the type library is 64-bit Windows systems.
